title: ATTuvikkum bommai
sahitya:
ATTuvikkum bommai nAnallavA pAlUTTi tALATTi sIrATTi vaLarttAlum nI


anupallavi

  nATkal pallAyiram kazhindadu teriyavillai nIrOTTam pOl kAlamum nagarnradu puriyavillai


caraNam    enadenrum nAn enrum eNNi muyalvEnE manam senra vazhi ninru dinamum alaindEnE
unadaDiyAr uraiyai EkAntamE uNarAdirundEnE kaNam piriyA unnai marandu pirindEnE
